header.title: Topic Preview
header.description: Displays an excerpt from the first post of a topic when the user hovers their mouse over the topic title, using the browser's built-in tooltip ability. The amount of text shown can be defined in the ACP, and the mod can also be turned off. It's much more simplified than other similar mods (no javascript or css needed), this version is designed to mimic the vbulletin method.
header.author-notes: Note, this mod was inspired by a similar mod by RMcGirr83's, and includes one function originally authored by him.

changelog.change: subsilver2 edits placed in a seperate MODX file
Fixed URL removal to include https, ftp, mailto and phpBB shortened URLs
Changed Mod name to Topic Preview
Now we also remove URLs from the tooltip preview (why waste space with raw URLs?)
Smileys are now displayed in the tooltip as text :)
Cleaned up old/unnecessary code in install file

edit.find: style="background-image: url({T_ICONS_PATH}{topicrow.TOPIC_ICON_IMG}); background-repeat: no-repeat;" title="{topicrow.TOPIC_FOLDER_IMG_ALT}">{NEWEST_POST_IMG} {topicrow.TOPIC_TITLE}

action-group.diy-instructions: ACP Configuration settings can be found under "Board Features" in the "General" tab. Be sure to purge your cache and style templates too for the mod changes to take effect.
